linkedwiki-desc: See the linked data in a wiki
linkedwiki-error-server: Sorry, the SPARQL server sent an error. (see details with parameter log=2)
linkedwiki-error-endpoint-init: Sorry, there is an error with your endpoint (see details with parameter log=2).
linkedwiki-error-endpoint-empty: Where is the endpoint or the configuration?
linkedwiki-specialsparqlquery_mainpage:
This page will be used to test, optimize and share your queries if you wish.

Post your questions to: [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension_talk:LinkedWiki Talk:LinkedWiki]
linkedwiki-specialsparqlquery_usethisque: Howto use this query in this wiki

Copy and paste this line in a page of this wiki.

See more: [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Extension:LinkedWiki Extension:LinkedWiki]
linkedwiki-specialsparqlquery_option1par: (without cache and only for public data)
linkedwiki-specialsparqlquery_option2tab: Table only (with cache and for public data or private data)
action-data-edit: edit data pages (in the namespaces Data and UserData), transfer these data with [[Special:RDFSave]] and check RDF graphs
right-data-edit: Edit data pages (in the namespaces Data and UserData), transfer these data with [[Special:RDFSave]] and check RDF graphs with [[Special:RDFUnit]]. [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Extension:LinkedWiki/Import_in_wiki_to_write,_check,_transfer_and_validate_RDF Documentations]
linkedwiki-lua-error-currentframe-nil: You can set manually the frame in a module with the code linkedwiki.setCurrentFrame(mw.getCurrentFrame())
linkedwiki-lua-tooltip-db-currently-date: Currently in DB: not a date
linkedwiki-lua-date-error: Error, it is not a date (example '2021-11-20'): $1
linkedwiki-lua-time-parser-error: Error, it is not a date/datetime (example '2021-11-20' or '2021-10-20T14:14:52+00:00'): $1
linkedwiki-lua-type-error-xsddate: Error, it is not a date with the type xsd:date (example '2021-11-20'): $1
linkedwiki-lua-type-error-xsddatetime: Error, it is not a date with the type xsd:datetime (example '2021-10-20T14:14:52+00:00'): $1
linkedwiki-lua-type-error-xsddecimal: Error, it is not a number with the type xsd:decimal (example '20.25' or '20'): $1
linkedwiki-lua-type-error-xsdint: Error, it is not a number with the type xsd:int (example '14'): $1
linkedwiki-lua-param-error-subject-unkno: Subject unknown (Use the parameter iriSubject or the function setSubject.
linkedwiki-lua-query-error-not-allow-to-: You cannot update the database via a query via Lua.
linkedwiki-lua-message-preview-or-histor: Mode PreviewOrHistory detected: data will not save
linkedwiki-lua-query-error-unknown: ERROR SPARQL (see details in mode debug)
